H0.text: what currency does cyprus use. Pound Sterling

H1.text: what currency does cyprus use. Turkish Lira

H2.text: what currency does cyprus use. Cypriot Pound

H3.text: what currency does cyprus use. Euro

A4.text: The Republic of Cyprus adopted the euro on 1 January 2008.

A5.text: The Cypriot pound was replaced by the euro as the official currency of the Republic of Cyprus on 1 January 2008.
